IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: INDEPENDENT, CO-EDUCATIONAL, NON-DENOMINATIONAL, NON-PROFIT COLLEGE PREPARATORY DAY SCHOOL FOR GRADES PRE-K THROUGH 12.
IRS990.MissionDesc: INDEPENDENT, CO-EDUCATIONAL, NON-DENOMINATIONAL, NON-PROFIT COLLEGE PREPARATORY DAY SCHOOL FOR GRADES PRE-K THROUGH 12.
IRS990.Desc: THE ORGANIZATION OPERATES AS AN INDEPENDENT, CO-EDUCATIONAL NON DENOMINATIONAL, NON-PROFIT COLLEGE PREPARATORY DAY SCHOOL FOR GRADES PRE-KINDERGARTEN THROUGH TWELFTH. SACRAMENTO COUNTRY DAY SCHOOL CONTINUES TO BE THE REGION'S LEADER IN PRIVATE SCHOOL COLLEGE PREPARATORY EDUCATION. SACRAMENTO COUNTRY DAY SCHOOL HAS SUCCCESSFULLY IMPLEMENTED AN ACADEMIC PROGRAM DURING THE PANDEMIC WHERE IT CAN PROVIDE IN-PERSON, REMOTE, OR A HYBRID EDUCATION TO ITS STUDENTS.

GrantsOtherAsstToIndivInUSGrp.GrantTypeTxt: NEED-BASED FINANCIAL AID: APPLICANTS' FINANCIAL NEED IS EVALUATED BY THE SCHOOL AND STUDENT SERVICE FOR FINANCIAL AID, LOCATED AT NAIS.ORG
TUITION REMISSION IS AVAILABLE TO THE CHILDREN OF REGULAR EMPLOYEES WHO ARE ELIGIBLE FOR BENEFITS. REMISSION PROVIDES FOR A REDUCTION OF 50% OF THE COST OF TUITION FOR EACH ELIGIBLE CHILD
NEED-BASED FINANCIAL AID FOR SUMMER CAMP AND AFTER SCHOOL ACTIVITIES: APPLICANTS' FINANCIAL NEED IS EVALUATED BY THE SCHOOL AND STUDENT SERVICE FOR FINANCIAL AID, LOCATED AT NAIS.ORG

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: TUITION ASSISTANCE IS DEDUCTED FROM THE GROSS TUITION AND THUS REDUCES THE AMOUNT OF TUITION A PARENT OWES THE SCHOOL.
LEE THOMPSON RECEIVED THE ABOVE BENEFITS OF HOUSING AND COMPANION TRAVEL AS THE HEAD OF SCHOOL. THE BENEFITS WERE TREATED AS TAXABLE AND INCLUDED ON HIS W-2.
